Pavilion Grille
Pavilion Grille is one of South Florida’s premier destination venues for dining, nightlife and special celebrations.
// page title markup in banner area
Corporate Events

page-header-wrapper
// CATEGORY NAV
Whether it’s a Holiday Party, Cocktail Party, Plated or Action Stations Buffet Brunch, Luncheon or Dinner, Business Seminar, Charity Fund-raiser or any other event, Pavilion Grille can help make it special.
Our private Grille Room is available for private Meetings and Seminars for Breakfast, Lunch or Dinner, with seating up to 60.
Our beautiful Atrium has a 3000 square foot Dance Floor and large Bar Area and holds over 240 Guests.  Our Lobby can also be used for larger functions, large Cocktail Events, small Trade Shows and Fundraising Events. We are also available for rentals.
Pavilion Grille is the ideal setting for all of your Corporate Events:
- Holiday Party
- Corporate Dinner
- Business Seminar
- Breakfast or Lunch Meeting
- Office Party
- Cocktail Party
- Sales Meeting
- Small Trade Show
- Retirement Party
Make your corporate event truly impressive with the Pavilion Grille.  Our professional full-time on premises event coordinators will customize menus and event packages to fit your budget.
Plan Your Party

page-header-wrapper
// CATEGORY NAV
The perfect event space.
The spectacular indoor Atrium area – with its tropical fountains, palm trees and canopy-covered 2,500 sq. ft. dance floor – was the perfect venue for Bar/Bat Mitzvah’s, Weddings, Sweet 16 parties, Quinces and all your celebrations with space for over 249 guests. We were rated “Best Food” on a Wedding episode of the hit TLC show “Four Weddings” and have many “Five Star” Reviews on Wedding and Special Occasion Websites.
Our Grille Room sat up to 50 guests for smaller family celebrations and corporate meetings. Our Atrium Bar was a popular place for Networking Events, Singles Groups and Corporate Company Happy Hours. Free self parking was always available.
Dinner and Music
We served  Dinner in our Atrium and served-- a delicious meal from our American Bistro menus followed by music from Motown to Ballroom, and Disco to Doo Wop, there was music for everyone plus a delicious meal.
Location
Pavilion Grille was located in the Atrium of the First National Bank Coastal Community (FNBCC) Building at 301 Yamato Road, Boca Raton, FL, at the corner of Yamato Rd. and Dixie Highway. For GPS directions, please input 301 NE 51st St, Boca Raton, FL 33431.

Contact Us
301 Yamato Rd.
Boca Raton, FL 33431
We're located in the First National Bank Coastal Community (FNBCC) building at the corner of Yamato
and Dixie Highway.
From I-95, Exit onto Yamato Rd. East ( EXIT 48) , Proceed East until Dixie Hwy., Turn left on Dixie, Then make an Immediate Right turn to the FNBCC building.
Phone: +1 (561) 912-0000
Fax: +1 (561) 998-7564
